strategy.reasoning: First day deployment strategy: Focus entirely on deploying site with existing 10 articles. No new content creation until deployment is complete and analytics baseline established. This ensures budget allocation goes to deployment infrastructure rather than content that may need optimization based on initial performance data.

deployment_priority.reason: Must deploy site with existing 10 articles before any new content creation. Need analytics baseline and initial indexing data to make informed content decisions.

Monitor initial indexing and crawl behavior
